song.title: Passion
song.info:
" p a s s i o n "
Written by Sonic/destiny
My entry for the X96 music competition
This song contains some home-made U220 samples,if you decide to use them, please credit me. They really took me alot of work!!!
If you feel the urge to contact me,just drop a line at sonic@quazar.idn.nl
Special hi's to the whole Destiny team. Respect to the whole music scene!
Signing off, Sonic.
Thanx to demoralize for letting me use his computer to finish this and to Diablo for actually letting me HEARING it :)
